fields.name: Length
fields.description: The measurement of distance between two points. Common units include meters, feet, and inches.

fields.name: Mass
fields.description: The amount of matter in an object. Common units include kilograms, pounds, and grams.

fields.name: Volume
fields.description: The amount of space occupied by an object or substance. Common units include liters, gallons, and cubic meters.

fields.name: Time
fields.description: The duration or interval between two events. Common units include seconds, minutes, and hours.

fields.name: Temperature
fields.description: The degree of hotness or coldness of an object or substance. Common units include Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

fields.name: Energy
fields.description: The ability to do work or cause a change. Common units include joules, calories, and kilowatt-hours.

fields.name: Pressure
fields.description: The force per unit area exerted by a substance. Common units include pascals, atmospheres, and pounds per square inch.

fields.name: Electric Current
fields.description: The flow of electric charge in a circuit. Common units include amperes and milliamperes.

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: The number of occurrences of a repeating event per unit time. Common units include hertz and megahertz.

fields.name: Angle
fields.description: The measurement of the space between two intersecting lines or planes. Common units include degrees, radians, and gradians.
